about_the_game:
Who Murdered My Empress is a time-travel slow-burn romance visual novel taking place in a fantasy world inspired by the 19th century in Vietnam.

You play as Mai, a strong-willed and analytical police officer from the present day. Injured during a case, you awaken in the year 1845, but not as yourself; you are now the infamously lustful Empress who rules the country.

Armed with the knowledge you learned from history books, you are determined to unearth the truth behind your arrival here and do your best to survive by avoiding mutiny and war.

Here, your life intertwines with Vu Huyen, a beautiful man with a mysterious heart. You must interact with him and your other Consort husbands while keeping your identity a secret. They all seem to harbor their own hidden motives, making your mission that much more challenging.

Why has this happened? Why are you here? And why does your heart beat against all logic?

You need to make the right choices to gain more useful information and avoid your bad endings.




Features
  • 13+ hours play
  • 1 true ending, 6+ bad endings
  • Unlock the male lead’s POV after the main story
  • Collect Vietnamese food dishes throughout the story
  • Unlock 3 special romance scenes (mini routes) with 3 characters (Minh Quang, Duy Khanh and Lan) when you fulfill certain criteria in the game
  • 40+ original backgrounds inspired by Vietnam’s feudal architecture
  • 10+ original soundtracks



Important:
  • This is not a dating simulation: In the main story line, there is only one main romance route, but you can interact with other love interests in an interesting way and unlock 3 special scenes with 3 other characters.
  • This novel is set in a fantasy fiction world and draws loose inspiration from Vietnam of the 19th century. All events, places, and characters depicted are entirely fictional and are the sole product of the author's imagination. It's important to note that this work is not meant to represent Vietnam.

content_descriptors.notes:
This visual novel is intended for mature audiences only and contains explicit sexual content. Viewer discretion is advised.

Trigger Warning: This visual novel contains themes that may be sensitive to some readers, including:
- Mention of drug and alcohol use
- War trauma
- Family trauma
- Mention of suicide
- Mention of sexual assault
For the full list of trigger warnings and their explanation, please visit our website. Please proceed with caution and take care of your emotional well-being. If any of these topics may be distressing for you, consider whether this content is appropriate for you.
